title: leave buster
body: Put me in low priority que for leaving too many games but i haven't left a game/afk in probably over 100 games?  Kind of annoying/ridiculous.

replies.body: Ignore Tantram, he's obviously just a bot that can only spew forth predigested bull****. Riot doesn't care, they can just replace you with 3 more players that will find the game in the next few days. You are a number, not a player.
Good luck with that. At best you will get a Riot employee telling you its you're fault and you left a lot of games or went afk a lot.
I just checked mine as well. The only times I have left a game was back when Riot servers had a "firewall bug"

Tried to play a game today with my friends (which is the only reason I stop playing Smite) and I am stuffed back into low priority queues. When i got wrongly punished for the firewall bug I completed over 20 games and only needed 10 to get out of it. But I am going to need some type of assistance before I just give up on this MOBA completely.

You were not wrongly punished. You've left or AFKed in a lot of games.

Here is the point that you seem to be missing sir. I had to complete 10 games, I completed more than those 10 games and have yet to leave a game since then or be "afk". Just to be clear I was put into low priority queue in the first place for the suppose "firewall bug" back in December, like everyone else complaining today. So before you try to have an attitude do your research.
You're not alone, I have the same issue.

King KSer: 
We delayed the application of punishments when many people were getting the firewall reconnect bug so people wouldn't be punished for it. Now that the issue has been fixed, your punishment that was previous assigned to you has to be served.
Same thing happened to me this is stupid i might start playing dota2 now

So what about me? Is my "punishment" being served now? And why now, right after a patch? And why? I have only rage quit once and been fully disconnected once (at least I can remember for the full disconnect) and served that some time ago.

I dc'd three times because of the firewall issue and was put in leaverbuster because of it. 

You're telling me my wrongful conviction is to be inconveniently delayed a month? I thought you actually had fixed it hah.

That's kind of ridiculous. I never afk or d/c except for when the firewall issues happened. If your servers are having such issues that you had to take it offline for a full month and  a half to get it resolved, you should have wiped the slate clean and started over. You can't punish people for something that happened so long go they can't even remember it. 

Ever heard of a statute of limitations? 

It's whatever, I'm almost done with it anyway, one more game, but it doesn't change the fact that it was a BS policy.
You are NOT being punished for a firewall bug. The system was turned off during that time.

Beebee1303,
You're in the same boat here. We wanted to make sure people didn't get punished for the firewall error issue that many were experiencing. You had a punishment that still needed to be served.

Can I ask you this? Why is a lot of people what wouldn't leave or AFK getting punished? This seems more like DRM, where it is hurting more of the real players then the leavers. I see so many complaints from people (Like me) that wouldn't leave or AFK. It puts a HUGE damper on my day when I want to have fun on ARAM, when I'm being punished for something that was a long time ago.
And why are we being punished for a firewall bug? Doesn't that seems like something that we literally can't control, it's a bug, it's not our fault. So why are a lot of people being punished for something that isn't our fault?

Who was the logistical smart guy that decided punishing someone a month after all problems are fixed is a good idea?  Because clearly the punishment will stop people from doing it again after they have already stopped.

dumbest thing I have ever seen

I am having the exact same issue. I haven't left a game or dc'd in ages and this just randomly appeared today?!

Can anyone at Riot help?
This happened a really long time ago, and I haven't left a game since. Makes me not want to play league.

After new patch i left a custom game after 1 afk incident and got put in low priority que and now even after a normal game i dont even leave the table for i get put in leavebuster but when i hit leave que it restarts next time i try to check it if i dont leave it on and wait the ten minutes in a row no chatting to friends either

Got a similar problem. Im getting over 1k ping in some games and its not my connection that has an issue. Last time it went as high as 1500. I tried everything i could to make it better but nothing worked. and now i got the leaver buster wanring and had to agree that i would not leave any more games. Well if your servers didnt suck some balls I wouldnt have left in the first place.
Makes me mad that i have to agree to a problem thats not even mine.
If a gm could msg me about this it would be great. Cause I want to know whats going on and how you gonna fix this.

Thats not our problem (At least for me).  After downloading the new patch I got the leave buster saying that I left a game, when you can look my recent games and see I haven't left any. So I just received 15-20 mins of wasting my time for no reason or an error on Riots part.
